title: Kyoto: Trip Planning
description:
On episode 366 of Sleep & Relax ASMR, I plan an upcoming trip to Kyoto that I'm not actually planning on taking, but it's fun to imagine right? The episode includes the experiences I would want to try while there.

---

Visit www.HelixSleep.com/RELAX for up to $125 off your mattress order. 

The Helix Dusk Luxe I'm sleeping on: https://helixsleep.com/products/dusk-luxe
